alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Greater Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Anderson and southeastern Pickens Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Easley, or 5 miles southeast of Liberty, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Piedmont, Northlake, West Pelzer, Williamston and Sandy Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
